name: 王賢達
objective: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、X-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Molecular Spectroscopy(2 weeks)
3. NMR(2 weeks)
4. MS(2 weeks)
5. Separation Techniques(2 weeks)
6. Elemental and Chemical Analysis
Mid-term Exam
7. X-ray Analysis
8. Microscopy
9. Image Analysis(If Time Available)
10. Surface Analysis
11. Thermal Characterization
12. Rheology and M.W. of Polymers
13. Physical Properties of Particles and Polymers
14. Applied Mechanics and Physical Testing
15. Scientific Computation
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance(30%)
Mid-term Exam(30%)
Final Exam(40%)
materials:
A Guide to Materials Characterization and Chemical Analysis
(J.P.Sibilia, 2nd ed. Wiley-VCH)
